last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gabe has to think fast as the police and the criminals close in. He fights for his life as events take an unexpected turn.

name: The Control Room
overview: The story of Gabe, an ordinary man who works as an emergency call handler for the Scottish Ambulance Service in Glasgow. His world is turned upside down when he receives a desperate life-and-death call from a woman who appears to know him. With Gabe under pressure to work out who she is, he makes a decision that threatens to have devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Call handler Gabe receives a desperate call from a woman who appears to know him. Under pressure to work out who she is, he makes a decision that may have devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Gabe is blackmailed into further criminal behaviour by Anthony. In order to escape the nightmare of the present, Gabe has to confront his past.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Gabe has to think fast as the police and the criminals close in. He fights for his life as events take an unexpected turn.
